name: No mor admin
author: Lee Thompson

sections.description: This plugin is real simple and basic, it doesn’t allow anyone that does not have admin rights to access wp-admin. This will help ensure security.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What if I allow users to post?

I use a plugin called uCan Post. You can download it here uCan Post uCan Post

What about the ability to edit profiles

You must use a plugin similar to Frontend Edit Profile located Frontend Edit Profile Frontend Edit Profile
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial Release

2.0

  • This version allows for the use of ajax call from the front end. Also compatable with Buddypress
